entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: NotifyCollectionChangedAction for item updated / item property changed #79713
  • [Mono] Unloadable ALCs. #79711
  • .NET 7 AOT x86/x64 Unable to build a method of a generic class that returns Type #79710
  • The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect - When a docker container is set to automatically restart or manually restarted #79707
  • [.NET 6/7] An alternative to Mono.Runtime.RemoveSignalHandlers/InstallSignalHandlers in .NET 6/7? #79706
  • LibraryImportGenerator should generate a souce that calls statefull-marshaller-with-caller-allocated-buffer's FromManaged for ref parameter #79702
  • missleading error net_io_invalidasyncresult #79700
  • [API Proposal]: enum PARSE attribute #79699
  • ZipArchive disposes passed stream twice #79695
  • Install-Package: Dependency loop detected for package 'System.Text.Encoding.CodePages'. #79688
  • [API Proposal]: Add SslStream.IsServerAlpnSupported #79687

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Crash with access violation instead of throwing System.NullReferenceException #79494
  • ThrowIfNull and ThrowIfNullOrEmpty could return a value #79691
  • Assertion failed '((tree->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) == 0) && "ERROR: Already morphed this node!"' during 'Morph - Global' #79543
    8.0.0
  • Backward binary compatibility #79650
  • [NativeAOT] ConcurrentDictionary is slower #68891
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Implement thin locks #75108
    8.0.0
  • It should be clearer why Guid.NewGuid fails in a .NET 7 wasmconsole (because crypto is not present in NodeJS by default) #79683
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests crashing in CI with Assertion failed: (numEvents != 0) #36466
    Future
  • Socket.BeginSendFile throws SocketException "The parameter is incorrect" when sending large files #41834
    Future
  • Test failure in CI System.Net.Sockets.Tests.OSSupportTest.IOControl_SIOCATMARK_Unix_Success #37181
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DnsEndPointTest.Socket_ConnectAsyncDnsEndPoint_Success(type: Async) #36737
    Future
  • Performance regressions on EF scenarios #36292
    Future
  • Blazor WASM / Browser WASM format as currency shows "AUD" instead of "$" #45262
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Value-numbering is over-conservative for image_rel32 statics #6552
    Future
  • Use a custom calling convention if necessary for math intrinsics that were previously x87 instructions. #6623
    Future
  • Proposal: Introducing a JIT intrinsic for acquiring timestamps #6956
    Future
  • 关于 HttpClient.PostAsync 使用JsonContent 时的问题 #79663
  • RyuJIT: Allow promotions of structs with fields of struct containing a single primitive field. #7441
    Future
  • [x86/Linux] Enable FEATURE_FIXED_OUT_ARGS #7574
    Future
  • RyuJIT: tail call stress assert in importer on Linux #7586
    Future
  • [x86/Linux] Call with an struct argument having long member #7674
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator System.NotSupported exception for IEnumerable Implementations #79661
  • [Jit] Loop condition doesn't elide bounds check #9422
    Future
  • Records class can not get property's CustomAttribute #79692
  • Add and EventSource test that test for a large number of events #6020
    Future
  • If I use more than 8 parameters value types values are setting to false or 0 #78170
  • SyndicationFeed_Write_RSS_Atom test failing with "IOException : The file '/tmp/' already exists." #78454
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Type.HasDefaultConstructor method #75362
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve spmi diffs summary report #79725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactoring store liveness update #79724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improve SIMD vector equality operator #79719
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • improve SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose test #79718
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Look up Queryable operator MethodInfos without MakeGenericMethod #79717
    area-System.Linq
  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix deviating XMLDoc for HostingEnvExtensions #79708
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix failing coreclr tests in `runincontext` mode #79705
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix WXORX issue in EEClass::Destruct #79703
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Prefer interpreted execution for AsQueryable #79698
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • More preparation for JIT\Regression test merging #79697
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] EXPERIMENT - Narrow tree lowering #79690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Delete MetadataType from the runtime type system #79693
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Refactor gtExtractSideEffList and fix GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED propagation #79611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Thin locks #79519
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Stop producing and handling `ADDR` nodes #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve "one asg morphing" and move it to `morphblock.cpp` #79037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Be more precise about choosing what to DNER in block morphing #77980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS][tvOS] Skip NullableTests.ClassWithDictionariesWithNullableValues #79675
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] fix aotProfiler init #79651
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Fix WXORX issue in EEClass::Destruct #79696
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix perf. regression caused by signed/unsigned comp #79137
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] WasmDebugLevel in samples #79644
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Do not generate cctor info on generic definition `MethodTable` #79689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] dotnet-runtime-perf: Fix V8 version to 11.0.162 #79682
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Remove some dead code from the legacy SIMD support #79680
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable loop alignment during asmdiffs #79629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ifdef out unsupported Enum underlying types for nativeaot #79472

Updated

  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fixes #79558 #79681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79669
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Ensure that OptionsCache only permits creating a single options instance per name #79639
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remaining feedback from ILLink merge #79677
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Split TryRead implementation into TryPopulate and TryCreateObject #79659
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Allow sharing call temps within statements #79574
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Re-Enable SendRecvPollSync_TcpListener_Socket Test #79145
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][interp] Allow passing vtypes with a single scalar field to nat… #79686
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add nullable reference type annotations to System.Text.Json source gen #79613
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Ensure that `TryGetContainableHWIntrinsicOp` is non-mutating #79363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add version info to NativeAOT Unix apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [iOS] Run more tests on the rolling build #79678
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-avx512

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: assert in ssabuilder #2117

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: compiler crashes for some struct optimisations #2112
  • NativeAot-LLVM: problem with NarrowFourUtf16CharsToAsciiAndWriteToBuffer #2114
  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: GT_ARR_LENGTH semantics #2061
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question - implicit truncation of longs? #1688
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: code generation for modifying arg locals looks broken in RyuJIT->LLVM backend #1729
  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: How do CSE vars get their definition #2036

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: funclets #2109
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Merge to last NativeAot commit #2111
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • net7 - Build freezes when publishing trimmed app #29571
  • dotnet run command not listening on https #29569
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web for Android #29567
    Discussion
  • `-interactive` switch is accepted, although only `--interactive` works #29564
    Backlog

Closed

  • Installing .net 7 on 20.04 should give error instead of silently install and not worked. #29184
    Discussion
  • Sdk tooling target framework should be net8.0 #29087
  • dotnet test /clp:ErrorsOnly not working after upgrade to 7.0.101 #29542

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29585
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (7.0.1xx backport) #29584
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.3xx. backport) #29583
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.1xx backport) #29579
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Merge pull request #28707 from JanKrivanek/template-verifier #29568
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #29470
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded to the current framework #29566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Pull razor dependencies from consolidate repo #29374
    Area-CodeFlow, 7.0.2xx
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration #29540
  • Improve generation of nested type symbols. #29552
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (7.0.2xx backport) #29549
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.4xx backport) #29548
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Area-DotNet Test
  • add item template for directory.build.props and directory.build.targets #29526
    Area-Templates, Area-Common templates
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • add class template #29518
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Common templates
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing space character in auto completed new statement for a C# array #66027
  • Suppress Warning CS6800 when the System Type.GetType(..) method's parameter throwOnError (bool) contains a true value #66025

Closed

  • Integration tests fail with "VSIX installer failed...Unable to find the specified file." #65824
  • Completion list is missing members when typing generic delegate parameter containing IEnumerable<T> #43847
    Backlog
  • Source generators in multi-targeted project being loaded twice #65996
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33215.136 #66029
  • Disabling Quick Info integration tests due to CI flakeyness. #62280

PullRequests

Created

  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support Go To Definition in Object Browser for metadata references #66026
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Report error implementing interface with `[UnscopedRef]` member #66024
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Improve performance of Document-Highlight-Refs #66023
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update PublicAPI.Shipped for 17.4 #65956
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Needs API Review
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66022
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65972
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge features/SharedSyntaxTrees into dev17.6 #66003
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.6 into features/SharedSyntaxTrees #66028
    Area-IDE
  • Consolidate IsExternalInit definitions #66020
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Breaking change: Disallow raw-string-literal interpolations at start of line when indentation-whitespace is present. #65973
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66032
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Update analyzers package version #65997
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • inheritdoc order fixes #54494 #54618
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Support MemberNotNull on required members in nullable analysis #65987
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update code style + dotnet-format #66021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable CA1052 (static holder types should be static) #65830
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unclear how to catch "System.Exception: Correlation failed." and prevent HTTP 500 #45620
  • [Blazor] NavigationLock LocationChangingContext CancellationToken cancelled every time navigation location changes #45618
  • Perf regression: https #45615
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #45614
  • VS 2022 17.4.3 throw a exception at startup: The startup hook simple assembly name 'Watch.BrowserRefresh.dll' is invalid #45610
  • Cannot override authentication in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing #45608
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor doesn't render components inside `template` tags #45605
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting RateLimiterPolicy GetPartitionAsync #45603
  • Perf regression: https, plaintext_express, plainTextSansFilter #45602
  • Perf improvement: json_actix, plaintext_express #45601
  • IServiceProvider.GetService throw exception “Ambiguous match found.” #45600
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to implement components using current DataAnnotationsValidator when multiple CascadingValues are required. #45598
  • Transient local build failures: error MSB3491: Could not write lines to file #45596

Closed

  • Blazor - Virtualization, mixing data between items on first load #45565
  • Blazor HotReload throws `System.NullReferenceException` when using Serilog #45536
  • Remove IISAuthenticationHandler as suggested by existing comments #45355
    8.0-preview1
  • CookieBuilder SameSite XML documentation is incorrect #41871
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, plaintext_nodejs #45570
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #45592
  • I have searched the existing issues #45613
  • Blazor Server - Html Source Blazor Info #45607
  • Add ASPNETCORE_URLS_GRPC change #45563
  • Net7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication no longer includes query string paramters in the return URL #45609
  • Blazor @bind:after not working on .NET 7 RTM release #44957
  • Blazor WebAssembly Msal TryAddAdditionalParameter("prompt", "select_account") does nothing #44854
    7.0.x
  • net7 Blazor WASM AAD authentication ends with There was an error trying to log you in: '"undefined" is not valid JSON' #44981
    7.0.x
  • Regression, Blazor WASM OIDC login callback to not sent to the requested page when published #44973
    7.0.x
  • ReadOnly exception from dotnet core middleware - Kubernetes container pods with a read-only filesystem #45476
  • Investigate enabling dotnet-maestro-bot for release/2.1 #24119

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a default value for SpaProxyKeepRunning #45616
    area-runtime
  • ChecksumValidator: support SHA256 #45612
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm component EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to impleme… #45599
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
    8.0-preview1
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Update documentation for default CookieBuilder options #44290
    Docs, area-security, 8.0-preview1
  • [blazor] remove custom loader for .wasm file #45611
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2067454 #45566
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Harden IPv6Any error handling #45529
    area-runtime, Test failures
  • Add support for {**catch-all routes} in Blazor #45587
    area-blazor
  • Adding untyped JsonTypeInfo overloads #45593
    area-runtime
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22607.6 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Do not generate Content for request parameters in OpenAPI #45439
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] Endpoint filter pipeline now returns EmptyHttpResult in case of 400 BadRequest #45109
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flyout on Windows doesn't display programmatically created entries. #12149
  • Toolbar Secondary Items Displaying like Primary Items in IOS #12140
  • IOS: Border Visual States Problem #12137
    Backlog
  • Hamburguer icon (Flyout Menu) does not actualice colors depending the theme of OS (Dark/Light) - Windows #12136
  • IOS: Scrollview inside Refrehview #12132
  • Refreshview - Collectionview sizing not working correctly #12131
  • CollectionView slow/jittering scroll #12130
  • ios16.1.1 pasting on entry causing crashing of app? Make unable to publish app on App store #12129
  • Cannot publish to Windows store, Publish menu is grayed out. #12127
  • The MAUI Blazor doesn't work on iOS 16.2. #12124
  • Azure DevOps builds failing with latest version of MAUI #12122

Closed

  • Unable to install Microsoft.Maui.Sdk.Msi.x64 during workload install dotnet 7.0.100 sdk #12030
  • dotnet-bot image doesn't load on Windows unpackaged app #6202
    Backlog
  • Custom Control Property does not Bind #8501
  • Can not start the Android Emulator with Visual Studio 17.4.3 #12110
  • Error rendering entry within a grid #11878
  • Label binding not works in collectionview in release mode #11726
  • Xamarin.AndroidX.Work.Runtime support for .net7 #11887

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/test 30000 #12152
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix SwipeItemView size issues #12148
  • [net7.0] Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #12147
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Fix crash using BackButtonBehavior and navigating to root #12146
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix crash typing in Shell SearchHandler #12145
    area/shell 🐢
  • [net7.0] Make OnShouldReceiveMapTouch static #12142
  • [net7.0] [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #12141
  • [net7.0] [Android] Invalidate Button background drawable if size changes #12139
  • [net7.0] Notify StrokeDashPattern changes with StrokeDashArray changes #12138
  • Improve BlazorWebView Docs #12135
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12128
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Flashlight API Docs #12144
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials MainThread API Docs #12143
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.2.221116.1 to 1.2.221209.1 #12133
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update Essentials Gyroscope API Docs #11925
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Use the UpdateHasContainer method everywhere #12119
  • [net6.0]Fix Managing Layout Children #12125
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, platform/tizen

Updated

  • [WinUI] Fix the size returned when measuring Frame #11779
    area/layout 🔲
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [net7.0] Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11791
    area/layout 🔲
  • Only set PublishReadyToRun for apps and not libs #12114
  • Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #11907
  • Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #10619
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • Rename W2DImage to PlatformImage #12104
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Allow transparent modal pages #11795
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Update Essentials Map API Docs #11936
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Improve CollectionView scrolling (Shadows) #10523
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to children #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 Planning
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12102
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using `ModelBuilder.Entity` in `DbContext.OnModelCreating` for an owned entity type results in a `System.InvalidOperationException` #29869
  • Issue with nested owned types and nullability #29868
  • Reverse-engineer sequence columns #29863
  • Owned value object not materialized after using Linq To SQL Union #29862
  • Add more validation for shared rows #29860

Closed

  • Linq query is throwing exception "could not be translated. Either rewrite the query in a form that can be translated... #29829
  • sql error when using CancellationToken and cancelling it fast multiple times #29861
  • API for raw JSONPATH queries #28824

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Revert shared columns validation breaking change #29867
    Servicing-consider
  • Don't validate shared columns have the same provider type unless they are used in a key, foreign key or a unique index #29866
  • Most of explicit and lazy loading for no-tracking queries #29865
  • Allow SQLServer Sequence/HiLo on non-key properties #29864

Merged

  • Don't try to discover FK properties when conflicting with 2 or more other FKs #29849
  • SQLite Scaffolding: Reverse engineer collation #29857

Updated

  • Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29805
  • [release/7.0] Avoid infinite loop during foreign key discovery #29850
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29807
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Handle FK on keyless entity type #29779
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29820
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Allow underscores in identifiers again #29822
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix code for EF6 many-to-many pattern #29793
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix missing HasForeignKey when principal key is an alternate key #29731
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
